misc: If not on the course, he is probably billing clients
biography: Lassi, a formidable presence on the golf course, brings a unique blend of analytical precision and raw power to the game. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, he is known for his strategic play and unwavering focus, qualities no doubt honed by his career as a lawyer.

Indeed, when Lassi is not navigating the fairways, he is most likely navigating the intricacies of legal code, diligently billing clients and defending their interests. This professional background seems to give Lassi a certain steely determination, making him a tough competitor in any format, be it individual or as part of a pair.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée and one Victor Trophy to his name, Lassi has consistently demonstrated his prowess in this prestigious tournament. As he prepares for his ninth appearance in 2025, one can be sure that Lassi will once again bring his A-game, combining legal acumen with golfing talent in pursuit of the coveted Hector Trophée.
